story: Apply emergency patch v2.1.3 to POS_12
starting_sentence: I need to apply an emergency patch to POS_12 with version v2.1.3.

args.justification: Emergency patch required for security vulnerability

goal_details.name: summarize
goal_details.response: Patch v2.1.3 applied to POS_12. The terminal was previously on version v2.1.2 with 2 issues and medium urgency.
